Create the eco-friendly flag on the Opportunity. Create it again on the Quote as a formula pulling from the opportunity.
Add the API Name to the Search Filter object > Filter Source Field and make sure it depends on Filter Source Object = Quote. Create the checkbox again on Product.
Create your Search Filter: Target Object = Product, Target Field = eco_friendly = true.
Filter Source object = quote and filter source field = eco_friendly.
Hidden = false

Then when you create your quote from an opportunity where the flag = true, the corresponding checkbox on the quote should also be true. Then Add Products > Product Selection screen > should be filtered down to just the Products which are also flagged. And since we didn't flag the filter as Hidden, you can Clear Fields from the filter panel on the right.
